description:
Member of the mobile police squad "Thunderbolt" of Tokyo; best friend of http://anidb.net/ch25723 [Robert DeVice]. His full name (from the manga and the second movie where he has only a cameo appearance) is Aida Nachi.
Turns into a monster in the TV series, after an (illegal) experiment of his police office with the drug "http://anidb.net/ch25824 [Domull]".
name: Aida Nachi
